headline: How Record Backlog and Dividend Hike At General Dynamics (GD) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: General Dynamics recently lifted its quarterly dividend by 5.6% to US$1.50 per share and reported a record US$118.00 billion year-end 2025 backlog, extending a 27-year streak of uninterrupted payments. This combination of a higher dividend and a sharply larger backlog highlights management’s confidence that strong cash generation can support ongoing shareholder returns despite tariff and supply chain pressures. Next, we’ll examine how the record US$118.00 billion backlog reshapes General...
